text: Rough Ridin' is a lost 1924 American silent western film directed by Richard Thorpe and starring Buddy Roosevelt. It was released by the Weiss Brothers on State Rights basis.The AFI Catalog of Feature Films 1893-1993: Rough Ridin' ==Cast== *Buddy Roosevelt as Buddy Benson *Elsa Benham as Mary Ross *Richard Thorpe as Dick Ross *Joe Rickson as Jack Wells *Frances Beaumont as Rosalind Nolan *Arthur Detlorf as Tubby *Mike Ready as Nolan ==Preservation== With no prints of Rough Ridin' located in any film archives,American Silent Feature Film Survival Database: Rough Ridin' it is a lost film. ==References== ==External links== * * *Lobby poster Category:1924 films Category:American silent feature films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Films directed by Richard Thorpe Category:American films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:1924 Western (genre) films Category:Lost Western (genre) films Category:Lost American films
title: Rough Ridin'
